cause.description:
Sometimes, we forget that our brain, like all of our other organs, is vulnerable to disease. During the course of a year, more than 54 million Americans are affected by one or more mental disorders. It's time to start talking openly about mental illness. Let's eliminate the stigma.
1. There is no health without mental health.
2. Mental illnesses are common, real, and treatable.
3. You are not alone.
cause.mission: There is help, there is hope, and the time has come to end the misconceptions.
cause.name: Eliminate the Stigma of Mental Illness
